meaningMnemonic: This is a negative form of the verb 思う which is used as an adverb. If you do something without thinking, you do it <vocabulary>unintentionally</vocabulary>. As an adverb, you can put this in front of things to say that you did them <vocabulary>involuntarily</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for this is the kun'yomi reading which you learned already, so you should be able to read this word as well.
